title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practice Competencies: XR-Based Learning for Digital Game Design Skill Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can implement 80% or more of core interaction elements required for game prototype production in XR environments
Learners experience a process of improving sound design elements three or more times by incorporating peer feedback
Learners strengthen collaborative design competencies by participating in community activities three or more times per week on a mobile-based microlearning platform
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
